raw_title: WIJESOORIYA, Major General  D S K
raw_body: WIJESOORIYA, Major General  D S K (Rtd) RWP RSP USP psc. Beloved husband of Udayakanthi, loving father of Charitha and Pavithra, father-in-law of Suneth, grandfather of Damitha, Saakyaa, Arya and Omindu, Son of late Victor and Shiela Wijesooriya, loving brother of Sarath, Lakshman (Bula), Upendra and Ravi. Remains will lie at ‘Restpect’ Jayarathne Funeral Parlour from 1730 hrs on 20 February 2024 onwards. Cremation will be held at 1730 hrs on 21  February 2024 at General Cemetery, Borella.      012430
